text: You can hear the sound of rattling bones.
Hollow sockets gleam with malevolence.
The air is thick with the sickly sweet odor of decomposition.
A nauseating presence lingers.
The scent of decay hangs heavy.
A horde of giant rats emerges from the shadows.
You can hear the sound of rattling bones.
Hollow sockets gleam with malevolence.
An ominous presence materializes.
You encounter a skeleton wizard and his minions.
